summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West 58th Street from 3rd Avenue Northwest to 14th Avenue Northwest, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8389 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
